strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: All Tyranid formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Tyranid Hive Fleet Dagon.

formations.name: 0-1 Nexus Swarm
extraUnits: Two to four Instinctive Swarms (except Mycetic Spore)

formations.name: Major Swarm
formations.units: One Hive Tyrant, four Tyranid Warriors and/or Zoanthropes
extraUnits: 0-1 Hive Tyrant in the Army may be replaced with the Dagon Overlord: 100 points
Any Dagon Overlord, Hive Tyrant, Tyranid Warriors may be upgraded to Shrike (Wings): Free

formations.name: Minor Swarm
extraUnits: 1+ Gaunts, Gargoyles or Biovores must be chosen.
Any Tyranid Warriors may be upgraded to Shrike (Wings): Free

sections.name: Secondary Synapse Swarms
sections.description: One for each Primary Synapse Swarm

formations.name: Nest Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Gargoyles, Biovores or Bio-Support
1+ Gaunts, Gargoyles or Biovores must be chosen

formations.name: Attack Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Carnifex, Bio-Attack, Bio-Support or Hierodule

formations.name: Infestation Swarm
formations.units: One Trygon Prime or three Ravener Alphas
extraUnits: One to two Burrower Instinctive Swarms

formations.name: Harasser Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gargoyles or Bio-Bombers

sections.name: Instinctive Swarms
sections.description: It is compulsory to buy the minimum amount of Instinctive Swarms indicated by each Synapse Swarm

formations.name: Hierodule
formations.units: One Barbed Hierodule or one Scythed Hierodule

formations.name: Mycetic Spore (0-1 per Swarm)
formations.units: Permits deployment via planetary assault rules if a Razorfiend or Hive Ship has been bought. This option is not allowed if the Dagon Overlord, Hive Tyrant and/or Tyranid Warriors have been upgraded to Shrike (Wings).

sections.name: Common Independent Swarms
sections.description: One for each Primary Synapse Swarm, no more than a third of the army

sections.name: Rare Independent Swarms
sections.description: One for each Primary Synapse Swarm, no more than a third of the army

formations.name: Bio-Titan
upgrades: Replace the Hierophant with a Hydraphant Bio-Titan: 225 points

formations.name: Bio-Vessel
upgrades: Replace the Razorfiend with a Hive Ship: 50 points
